name: Lidar Ben-Dor
title: Software Engineer
profile: Software engineer with hands-on experience in Python, React, TypeScript and C#. Proven ability to deliver end-to-end solutions in fast-paced startup environments. Ambitious, autodidact and team player, excited to tackle new challenges. Seeking a full-time position as a Software Engineer.

Developed frontend interfaces using JavaScript, CSS, and Retool.
Gained experience in programming with prompt languages to enhance application functionality.
